name: Only the Roots Remain
description:
A new soul pops into existence; Sapling. Across the way, an old, soul resides; Oak. Behind them stands a strong tree, a symbol of their connection. How far do the roots go?

Story/Game Design: Christian Krueger 

 Programmer: TiltedTeapot 

 Artist/Music/FX: Dawn Silver 

 Artist/Concept Artist: Alexander Boykiw 

 --- Credits Due --- 

 Background Music:

- Beautiful Mind by Keyframeaudio

FX:

- Forest ambience, birds, wind in trees, leaves falling, Queensland, Australia by Zapsplat

- Strong howling wind blowing through grassland and trees by Zapsplat

- Ambience of a forest, wind, birds, insects, less presence by Silverplatter Audio

- Strong wind with howling gusts by Felix Blume

- Wood, medium impact, collapse, split and splinter by Audio Mangler
